title: Ororo, Facio, Mixo etc.
content:
Hi everyone, this is not a commercial release but I just finished my website where you can have a look at the typefaces I drew this year (Ororo, Mixo, Facio, Pandoro, Goldino, Futuro).

[http://matthieucannavo.fr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414042811/http:/matthieucannavo.fr/)

Below are some samples but you can find a lot more on the website.  
I'm looking for an internship or a job in Paris or in Europe so if anybody have a idea please don't hesitate.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414042811im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sp%C3%A9cimen_2013_Cannavo13%20copy_6205.jpg)

author: Matthieu Cannavo

comments.content: I like "Facio". a spinoff of Eric Gill's "Gill Facia". Beautiful
